document.discussion_title: Motorists face delays after crash on M62 motorway
document.topic_text: Motorists face delays after crash on M62 motorway 0 Have your say Motorists are facing long delays on the motorway following an accident. There is disruption on the M62 Westbound between Junction 25 Brighouse and Junction 22 Denshaw after multiple vehicles were involved in a collision close to Junction 23 at Huddersfield earlier this morning. All lanes are now clear. But Highways England said the backlog will take time to clear and urged road users to allow extra time for their journey and consider alternative routes if possible. TRAVEL ALERT: Broken down vehicle causing delays on Doncaster stretch of motorway 0 Have your say Motorists travelling on a Doncaster stretch of motorway are experiencing significant delays this morning, due to a lane closure caused by a broken down vehicle. One lane is currently closed on the M18 northbound between J3, A6182 (St... South Yorkshire Times , 5 August 2016 in Yorkshire & Humber Motorists face delays on A1 and M62 Motorists face delays on the A1 near Pontefract this afternoon (Monday). Two lanes are closed on the northbound carriageway between junction 40 and junction 41 with the M62 because of an overturned vehicle. There are also delays on the M62 between... Pontefract & Castleford Express , 24 June 2013 in Yorkshire & Humber
